SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.api

Class TestAuthFlowController

java.lang.Object
com.platform.auth.api.TestAuthFlowController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/auth") @Profile("!prod") public class TestAuthFlowController extends Object
Test-only controller to align integration tests with a simplified auth flow. Active in all profiles except production for security.
